ing: 1 (2 liter) bottle lemon-lime soda (such as SpriteÂ®)
des: "Halloween is supposed to be horrific and gross, but this punch is spooky and sweet."
ins: Cut the top off of the pumpkin and thoroughly scrape out the seeds and pulp. Scoop the lime sherbet into the pumpkin shell, and pour the lemon-lime soda over top.
